industry_content.main_heading: Grow Your Business with a Virtual Office
industry_content.industry_paragraph:
For service-based professionals, whether you run a marketing firm, IT company, trucking and logistics business, real estate agency, or insurance practice, credibility and flexibility are key.

Opus Virtual Offices provides the professional foundation you need to strengthen your brand image, impress clients, and operate efficiently from anywhere.

From startups to established businesses, Opus Virtual Offices scales with your needs, offering month-to-month flexibility and no long-term commitments.

With our virtual office business address, you’ll drastically reduce overhead while still maintaining a prestigious, professional image!

In the United States, the national average cost for leasing an office space is roughly $33 per square foot, according to a Commercial Edge report. But that is only the average. In cities like New York, Chicago, San Francisco, and Boston, you will typically pay a lot more.

Prime locations in major business districts command higher rental rates due to their high foot traffic, reputation, and accessibility. For instance, rental costs are higher in real estate markets in busy cities like New York and Los Angeles, which average $50-$200+ per square foot.

Establish your business in a prime city location and save thousands with our virtual office instead!

As a service business, maintaining exceptional customer service for your clients is critical. With Opus, our live receptionists ensure every call gets answered promptly. From current clients to prospective ones, the virtual Receptionist will answer every call during office hours, so you can focus on growing your business.

An All-inclusive Opus virtual office includes more than just an address. You’ll receive professional mail handling, package acceptance, and access to our virtual receptionist, ensuring every call is answered professionally while you focus on serving your clients.

Additionally, our premium address locations offer on-demand access to meeting rooms and private offices in prime city locations, perfect for client presentations or team collaboration sessions. Business consultants are especially appreciative of our virtual office because it provides the flexibility to meet clients professionally anywhere in our network.

industry_content.main_heading: Get started today and discover how a virtual office with Opus can elevate your business presence and support your growth, no matter where you work.
